summary:
This mod will add flying carpet which can fly high in sky and take you
high in sky to explore the skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
======================================================================
Flying Carpet
=====================================================================

YOU NEED SKSE TO FLY WITH CARPET.
To download skse go to http://skse.silverlock.org/

=====================================================================

Now explore the skyrim with the flying carpet.
======================================================================

This mod will add flying carpet which can fly high in sky and take you
high in sky to explore the skyrim. 

========================================================================

A Flying carpet ring and summon flying carpet spell is added to your inventory
when you start the mod.

=====================================================================================

Summon FlyingCarpet anywhere anytime with Summon FlyingCarpet Spell Under conjuration
Section

=======================================================================================
You need to equip the flying carpet ring to able to fly the carpet.
========================================================================================
The controls for flying carpet is as follows
======================================================================================
space= to takeoff

W = To move foreward

A= to move left

S= to move backwards

D= to move right

Lt Control= to takedown
=========================================================================================
 
To stop flying Simply enquip the ring.

=========================================================================================
You can summon or dismiss the carpet with Summon FlyingCarpet spell under
Conjuration Section.

========================================================================================
Warning Do not try to dismount from carpet while flying or your character will stuck forever in carpet.
To dismount simply enquip the flyingcarpet ring the carpet will come down then dismount.

=========================================================================================
Known Bugs
=========================================================================================
The mounting and dismounting animation dont look much nice.I will try to replace that if i can.
no other issues.

Leave comments for any other bugs you encountered while playing this mod.

=========================================================================================
Please Endorsed if You like the mod.
=========================================================================================
Thank You
=========================================================================================

here is the video made by rickyrickylo
[youtube]ibwDq6-yD1Q[/youtube]
author: Praveen
